Action.body: ~Artemkaaas As i understand we updated indy cli to don't require did for some operations. Could you describe the changes in more details to help QA?

Action.body: Changes in Indy-Cli : it is not necessary now to have an active `did` (call `did use`) to be able to call `ledger get-*` commands.
